label: Archive Formats
description: Utilized by file-roller to extract or compress different formats

exec.label: Install
exec.script: run-as-root yum -y install cabextract lzip p7zip p7zip-plugins unrar

undo.label: Uninstall
undo.script: run-as-root yum -y --setopt clean_requirements_on_remove=1 erase cabextract lzip p7zip p7zip-plugins unrar

status.script: rpm --quiet --query cabextract lzip p7zip p7zip-plugins unrar
